footer.mailstar: is the best platform to help you grow your business through building stronger customer relationships.

who_we_are.title: Who we are
who_we_are.content: {{siteName}} is the only all-in-one digital marketing platform empowering B2B and B2C businesses, ecommerce sellers and agencies to build customer relationships through end to end digital marketing campaigns, transactional messaging, and marketing automation.

our_story.title: Our story
our_story.begin: {{siteName}} was founded with a mission to make the most effective marketing channels accessible to all businesses. {{siteName}} has over 200 employees supporting more than 10,000 active users across 50 countries all the world.
our_story.middle_1: Unlike other marketing solutions built for enterprise-level budgets and expertise, {{siteName}} tailors its all-in-one suite to suit the marketing needs of growing SMBs in tough markets.
our_story.middle_2: We are constantly improving to bring new values ​​in line with world trends. Done still retains its own core values.
our_story.finish: {{siteName}}  provide marketing services on many different platforms to help users reach a wider audience. Thereby, it is possible to achieve the goal that the customer wants.

term_1.title: 1. General recommendations.
term_1.paragraph_1: - Put yourself in your customer's shoes. Ask yourself if the message you are sending is something you would want to receive in your own inbox. If the answer is anything less than an enthusiastic "yes!" then you probably shouldn't send it.
term_1.paragraph_2: - Some industries have a reputation for poor quality or even malicious email practices. If you are  involved in the following industries, you must monitor your reputation very closely and resolve issues immediately:

term_2.title: 2. Domain and "From" address considerations.
term_2.paragraph_1: - Think carefully about the addresses you send email from. The "From" address is one of the first pieces of information your recipients see, and therefore can leave a lasting first impression. Additionally, some ISPs associate your reputation with your "From" address.
term_2.paragraph_2: - Consider using subdomains for different types of communications. For example, assume you are sending email from the domain example.com, and you plan to send both marketing and transactional messages. Rather than sending all of your messages from example.com, send your marketing messages from asubdomain such as marketing.example.com, and your transactional messages from a subdomain such as orders.example.com. Unique subdomains develop their own reputations. Using subdomains reduces the risk of damage to your reputation if, for example, your marketing communications land in a spam trap or trigger a content filter.
term_2.paragraph_3: - If you plan to send a large number of messages, don't send those messages from an ISP-based address such as sender@hotmail.com. If an ISP notices a large volume of messages coming from sender@hotmail.com, that email is treated differently than an email that comes from an outbound email sending domain that you own.
term_2.paragraph_4: - Work with your domain registrar to ensure that the WHOIS information for your domain is accurate. Maintaining an honest and up-to-date WHOIS record demonstrates that you value transparency, and allows users to quickly identify whether or not your domain is legitimate.
term_2.paragraph_5: - Avoid using a no-reply address, such as no-reply@example.com, as your "From" or "Reply-to" address. Using a no-reply@ email address sends your recipients a clear message: that you aren't offering them a way to contact you, and that you're not interested in their feedback.

term_3.title: 3. Compliance.
term_3.paragraph_1: - Be aware of the email marketing and anti-spam laws and regulations in the countries and regions you send email to. You're responsible for ensuring that the email you send complies with these laws. This guide doesn't cover these laws, so it's important that you research them. For a list of laws, see <1>Email Spam Legislation</1> by Country on Wikipedia.
term_3.paragraph_2: - Always consult an attorney to obtain legal advice.

mail_pricing.title: Only pay for what you send
mail_pricing.sub_title: At {{siteName}}, we only charge based on the emails you actually send. Enjoy unlimited subscribers and unleash the power of proper segmentation

business_option.sub_title: Built for marketing managers and e-commerce pros

enterprise_option.sub_title: For large organization’s with specific needs

mail_paying.title: Pay As You Go Pricing
mail_paying.sub_title: Pay for what you need, when you need it.

telegram_option.title: Pre-paid Telegram credits
telegram_option.sub_title: Get 1000 free Telegram messages each month (requires a Telegram Business account). Then purchase Telegram credits to send campaigns whenever you need. No expiration date.

viber_option.title: Pre-paid Viber credits
viber_option.sub_title: Get 1000 free Viber messages each month (requires a Viber Business account). Then purchase Viber credits to send campaigns whenever you need. No expiration date.

sms_option.title: Pre-paid SMS credits
sms_option.sub_title: Purchase SMS credits to send messages whenever you need. No expiration date.

email_option.title: Pre-paid Email credits
email_option.sub_title: Purchase credits to send emails with no daily sending limit and without the Sendinblue logo. No expiration date.

feature_first.message_section_optimization: Our AI-powered system will maximize your engagement by sending emails at the perfect time.
feature_first.message_section_report: Keep tabs on how your campaigns are performing. Dig deeper into insights to make smart decisions for future campaigns.

feature_second.message_section_do_more: Automate repetitive tasks to reach the right person at the right time without delay. Build custom automated workflows for emails and customer experiences.
feature_second.message_section_testing: Send the best version of your email campaign, every time. A/B testing leads to higher open rates and more conversions for your emails.

subscription.title_be_yourself: Be yourself in every email you send

faq_1.label: Do I have to enter my credit card details to sign up?
faq_1.content: No. We only need your email address and the name of your organization, and then you will be able to start creating campaigns.

faq_2.label: Do I need any prior knowledge or skills?
faq_2.content: Not at all! {{siteName}} is designed with simplicity in mind, so we have the tools you need to easily build beautiful emails, create lists and set advanced preferences. If you ever need guidance, you can take a look at our many tutorials and resources, or contact our support team.

faq_3.label: Are there any contracts?
faq_3.content: There are no contracts or hidden fees with {{siteName}}. You may change plans or cancel at any time. Sign up for a plan or purchase credits as you need them; there are no additional charges.

faq_4.label: Why choose a pay-as-you-go plan?
faq_4.content: A pay-as-you-go plan is ideal for businesses and organizations that don't send emails often, or that don’t have a large contact list. PAYG credits do not expire, so you can use them at your own pace. One email sent equals one credit deducted. You still get all of our great features and services, however they do not include phone support. It is still possible to easily buy more credits or shift to a monthly plan at anytime though.

faq_5.label: Can I use my monthly plan for transactional email only?
faq_5.content: Yes, you can! To help new transactional (SMTP) senders build a positive reputation over time, we apply an hourly sending bandwidth for accounts using our shared IPs. You'll start with the capacity to send 40 emails per hour, and your bandwidth will be adjusted automatically based on your engagement metrics. (Bandwidth limits do not affect senders using a dedicated IP.)

faq_6.label: Can I try {{siteName}} before purchasing a plan?
faq_6.content: Absolutely! When you create an account, you will automatically have a Free plan to upload unlimited contacts. Once we approve your account for sending, you can start sending up to 300 emails per day!

faq_7.label: What if I change my mind?
faq_7.content: If you change your mind, you can cancel your plan at any time directly from your account. Your data will be stored if you wish to use our services again, or we can delete all of your records upon your request.

faq_8.label: How can I pay?
faq_8.content: All payments are made by credit card, through our secure payment processor, Adyen, or by Paypal. If you subscribe to a monthly plan, the subscription period is 30 days and charges are processed at the beginning of each period. Email and SMS credits are charged at purchase. All statements are available within your account.

faq_9.label: What is a dedicated IP?
faq_9.content: A dedicated IP plan allows you to send email campaigns using your domain name and your own signature. You create transparency with your customers and build a reputation based on your IP and your domain name.

faq_10.label: Still have questions?
faq_10.content: Contact us at {{contactEmail}} and we would be happy to answer any additional questions you may have.

email_flatform.title: Email Marketing
email_flatform.message: We provide services with fast, convenient and easy-to-use mailing methods. There are many templates beautiful for you to choose from. You can also customize your own templates by dragging and dropping easily.

sms_flatform.title: SMS Marketing
sms_flatform.message: Send with sms helps to reach people of different ages. Suitable for community-driven campaigns. We provide letter templates with the keywords you want to pass in to target the audiences you want to promote.

telegram_flatform.title: Telegram Marketing
telegram_flatform.message: Telegram is quite popular platform among young people, these are potential customers. We also provide services so that you can communicate with young customers easily and quickly.

viber_flatform.title: Viber Marketing
viber_flatform.message: The communication method is common in many countries, allowing you to communicate and advertise with many users around the world. Helps you reach more people in less time.

facebook_flatform.title: Messenger Marketing
facebook_flatform.message: With the advantage of being the number one messaging app in the world, messenger promotion is the most popular method. We support a number of special features to make your promotional messages livelier and more accessible.

slogan_1.title: Pick your tools
slogan_1.message: We’ll help you reach the right people and produce the right content

slogan_2.title: Work smart not hard
slogan_2.message: Focus on the important tasks and put the rest on autopilot with automation

slogan_3.title: We've got your back
slogan_3.message: We’ll be here round-the-clock to support you with any questions

privacy_section.title: Your data privacy and security are a top concern for us

privacy_notice.title: Privacy Notice
privacy_notice.sub_title: Your data is safe with us

block_gdpr.title: Pioneering GDPR compliance
block_gdpr.description: Consumers are becoming increasingly concerned about data privacy and their rights when it comes to personal data. Reassure your customers by choosing a solution with built-in GDPR compliance. With servers located exclusively in the EU, {{siteName}} is a pioneer of GDPR compliance in digital marketing, supporting your business with:
block_gdpr.condition_3: Automated routing system for Data Subject Requests
block_gdpr.condition_4: Data Subject Request management natively within the platform
block_gdpr.condition_5: Advanced compliance review of data processing chain

block_certificate.title: ISO 27001:2013-certified
block_certificate.description: The ISO 27001:2013 is one of the most widely recognized international information security standards. {{siteName}} certification demonstrates our commitment to upholding a comprehensive, multi-level data security framework. Beyond that, the certification represents our investment in physical and human resources dedicated to data security. As a {{siteName}} client, your data is protected by:
